content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 26 Sep 2018Anyone attended the Adam Khoo Wealth Academy before?Recently went to the basic investment talk held by Adam Khoo Wealth Academy, the talk was really fruitful and makes me really interested in attending the 3-day course. However, it costs $7k! Would like to get some feedback if it's worth to invest 7k to learn investment with Adam Khoo Wealth Academy? Said to be able to achieve financial freedom after learning.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Jan 2019If you are balking at the cost fee, imagine the amount you need to set aside for your account to really take advantage of his strategies. These are stock based if I recall correctly from the free preview (which I agree is really informative), hence a sizeable amount of funds may be required. There are alternative courses that cost less and require less of an amount for account funding out there. 0 comments0
